title: Designing Dithieno-benzodithiophene-based Small Molecule Donor for Thickness-Tolerant and Large-Scale Polymer Solar Cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04300B, Paper
Shanshan Wang, Lin-Yong Xu, Rui Sun, Bo Xiao, Mingxia Chen, Meimei Zhang, Wei Gao, Biao Xiao, Alex K. Y. Jen, Renqiang Yang, Jie Min
The power conversion efficiency (PCE) of polymer solar cells (PSCs) has steadily improved, but there are still some unresolved issues. One problem is that the active layer is highly sensitive...
